name: Super Soul Angel
description:
You wake up, anticipating another boring day of soul supervising in Limbo when your Boss rings in, finally giving you a new job for the first time in millennia. Retrieve a soul from Hell.

"Easy enough," you think to yourself as your Boss hangs up. "This would be a good chance to stretch my wings."

You pick up your Holy Handgun and trusty grappling gun.

 "Time to move."

Super Soul Angel is a 3D third-person action shooter where you play as an Angel sent on a mission to retrieve a certain soul from Hell.

Use your grappling gun to traverse the City that is Hell, shooting demons that try to stop you, and advance to the next level.
